tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (RB Almost) (DT that) (NN time)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NN day) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB take) (NP (NNP Danny)) (PP (TO to) (NP (NN class))))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [time/NN advmod>Almost/RB det>that/DT nmod:of>[day/NN case>of/IN det>the/DT acl>[take/VB mark>to/TO dobj>Danny/NNP nmod:to>[class/NN case>to/TO]]]]
